word: Doctrinal Differences Not to Alienate Us.--Although its friends do not believe with us in many points of doctrine, [NOTE: REFERENCE IS HERE MADE TO THE MARTHA WASHINGTON HOME IN CHICAGO, WHERE, UPON INVITATION, MRS. WHITE GAVE A TEMPERANCE ADDRESS. --COMPILERS.] yet we will unite with them when by so doing we can aid our fellow men. God would have us individually learn to work with tact and skill in the cause of temperance and other reforms, and employ our talents wisely in benefiting and elevating humanity.
